alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 12:13PM EDT until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise .Runoff from heavy rain will cause the Green River at Paradise to rise into minor flood stage. The river is forecast to rise into flood stage on Wednesday and remain above flood stage until further notice. For the Green River...including Paradise...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 372.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to 383.3 feet early Thursday afternoon. It will then fall to 383.1 feet and begin rising again Thursday evening. It will rise to 383.5 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall again but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
